title: can we talk about AP junglers for a bit
body:
outside of {{champion:20}}  (who is ok because he ulti is _horribly_ overturned)

most ap jungler are in a bad spot...

{{champion:9}}  is MUCH better as a mid laner right now, and even support
{{champion:131}}  is like non existent in the jungle  OR mid lane
{{champion:60}}  is "ok" i guess but i dont have much data on her
and my main {{champion:76}}  is finally viable with the buff to {{item:3102}}  but still iffy unless you are already good at her

and there are clear and obvious reasons why

firstof which is {{item:1410}} (runic)  it gives 60 ap...

AP junglers start with ZERO AP where as AD jungler start with their normal AD

{{item:1408}} (warrior) gives 60 AD

so right off the bat AD junglers have a advantage because their skills START with damage ratios ... while our skills really are just based damage with w/e minuscule ratio from the runes we have 

back when it was enchantment magus... we had 80 ap on our jungle item..

in fact AP for the same price ALWAYS give more AP than AD does BECAUSE AP starts with ZERO AP (among other reasons)
then we also got the AP from blue buff removed  again this cuts our damage. where as red smite is pretty much the same..
and lastly we lost the 20% mana on smite of a champ

AP junglers NEED mana to clear at the same spear as AD jungler because our auto attacks are weak.
and yet every camp now gives 10% hp but NONE of them give MANA...

also BECUASE mana is absultely nesscary  EVERY ap jungle NEEDS to rush a complted {{item:1410}}  for the mana reconvery proc
while AD can just get the basic {{item:3711}}  and then itemize according to the game..

all this together means that AP jungler's pretty much don't exist.

Diana never belonged in the jungle. She's still dominant in mid lane, but a bit less so after the D.Ring changes. Proper play will lead her to victory still, at least.

Teemo is pretty good; but he isn't SUPPOSED to be in the jungle.
Ivern is AP but he's technically a support.
Akali is pretty good, but she's AD hybrid and has no mana costs.
Leona is hilariously good, but she's a support.
Rammus is OK.
...Yeah AP jungle really is bad right now...

Leona jungle is 'hilariously good?' Really?

Not being snarky, I'm genuinely surprised Leona found her way out of bot lane. She seems pretty single-minded in design.

She is single minded in design they don't even consider her JG potential; she's tanky with tons of CC, and has aoe spells + dmg reduction, it lets her clear weirdly fast, and her Ganks are terrific, especially post 6 when she can zone the fuck out of people.
Problem with JG mages is that mages by definition need a squishy early game, but jungles have to have a level of protection or sustain to really succeed against their competition.
